name: T.I.M.E
description:
T.I.M.E - Temporally Integrated Modular Essence

You are a small machine that needs a lot of T.I.M.E so that you can run properly. But your T.I.M.E is running out! Use your glue balls and solid bars to advance trough the world. Be careful of your T.I.M.E usage and avoid dangerous spikes! 

But hurry up, because you got no T.I.M.E !

This Game is more like a concept and not finished. There is no Sound, the Design is "special" and bugs are common. Nonetheless I hope you can enjoy fiddling around with the controls and will see it as an interesting challenge.

Feedback on the mechanics and the game idea are welcome !
